text: The recon RPA identified an ice stormâ€”or maybe it was a nice, stable AO. Either way, CAS should proceed under the ROE. If hostile troops are ID'd, submit a 9-line CAS request. ATO lists all assets cleared for CAS along the FLOT near OBJ Eagle.
prompt: The audio file may contain the following terminology, listed here for your convenience: ALR, RPA, RWR, ECM, IADS, AO, FLOT, GPS, FL, RTB, Zulu, ISR, PID, BDA, ATO, CAS, TOT, JTAC, IFF, TACAN, RPA, ID, CAS, ATO, FLOT, OBJ, AWACS
